resources.string: This is the official Android SDK for the Neato API services. Importing the Neato SDK in your projects you can easily implement applications that communicate with Neato robots. We did the hard work for you so you can focus on implementing your apps!
These buttons are enabled or disabled on the base of the current robot state.

The "find me" feature is available only on some robot models, so before calling it on the robot please check the service availability. In your app you can choose to completely hide this button if the robot doesn\'t support it.
You can enable or disable at all robot scheduling
This button set the robot scheduling to \"every Wednesday at 3:00 pm\" in Turbo mode.
This button retrieves the robot schedule
This button retrieves the robot available maps and then the details of the first map
